raw_comment:
1) What do you notice? 
I noticed that clean electricity generation has a more significant increase than fossil generation. This is evident due to the nuclear, hydroelectric, and other, wind and solar increasing each by about a little over 10 million. 
2) What do you wonder?
I wonder how this graph was created and what sampling method was used to receive the answers to support this data. 
3) How does this relate to you and your community?
The whole world requires all the generations evident in the graph and my community can receive a better understanding of the increase of these generations. This could help bring awareness of the fossil generations that may need to be lessened and communities can gather to help. 
4) Whatâ€™s going on in this graph?
Electricity Generations Increasing by Millions Each Year
ace_sentences: I notice that clean electricity generation increased more than fossil electricity generation.
This is evident because nuclear electricity generation increased by a little over 10 million.
This is evident because hydroelectricity generation increased by a little over 10 million.
This is evident because wind electricity generation increased by a little over 10 million.
This is evident because solar electricity generation increased by a little over 10 million.
I wonder how this graph was created.
I wonder what sampling method was used to obtain the data.
The whole world requires all electricity generations that are shown in the graph.
My community can get a better understanding of the increase of these electricity generations.
This understanding can bring awareness that fossil electricity generation may need to be reduced.
Communities can gather to help reduce fossil electricity generation.
The headline is: Electricity generations increase by millions each year.
